titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, United States International Affairs Program (USIAP)
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, United States International Affairs Program (USIAP) FA1709

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-02-17 11:16:08 -0500.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, United States International Affairs Program (USIAP)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Material includes but is not limited to records doocument work in rural poverty and resources, urban poverty, and education and culture.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by program, file type, or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at https://rockarch.org/collections/access-and-request-materials/#citations
